entry.title: The Double Taxation Relief (Surrender of Relievable Tax Within a Group) Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations provide for the surrender of eligible unrelieved foreign tax (“EUFT”) by one company in a group to another.

entry.title: The Police Act 1997 (Criminal Records) (Registration) Regulations 2001
entry.summary: This version of the The Police Act 1997 (Criminal Records) (Registration) Regulations 2001 is published under the authority and superintendence of the Queen's Printer of Acts of Parliament and Controller of HMSO. It has been prepared to reflect the text as it was Made.

entry.title: The Health and Personal Social Services (2001 Act) (Commencement No. 1) Order (Northern Ireland) 2001
entry.summary: This Order brings into operation on various dates certain provisions of the Health and Personal Social Services Act (Northern Ireland) 2001 (“the Act”).

entry.title: The Employment Tribunals (Constitution and Rules of Procedure) Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations re-enact the Employment Tribunals (Constitution and Procedure) Regulations 1993 (the “1993 Regulations”) with amendments. In addition to minor and drafting amendments, re-numbering and the updating of statutory and other references, these Regulations make the following changes of substance.

entry.title: The ACAS Arbitration Scheme (England and Wales) Order 2001

ukm:Subject.Value: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT, ENGLAND AND WALES

category.term: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT, ENGLAND AND WALES

entry.summary: This Order sets out a scheme, submitted to the Secretary of State by ACAS pursuant to section 212A of the Trade Union and Labour Relations (Consolidation) Act 1992, providing for arbitration in the case of disputes involving proceedings, or claims which could be the subject of proceedings, before an employment tribunal arising out of a contravention or alleged contravention of Part X of the Employment Rights Act 1996 (unfair dismisal). The Order extends to England and Wales only. The Order provides for the Scheme to come into effect on 21 May 2001. The Scheme will provide from that date a voluntary alternative to the employment tribunal for the resolution of unfair dismissal disputes by arbitration where both parties agree.

entry.title: The Employment Tribunals (Constitution and Rules of Procedure) (Scotland) Regulations 2001
entry.summary: These Regulations re-enact the Employment Tribunals (Constitution and Procedure) (Scotland) Regulations 1993 (the “1993 Regulations”) with amendments. In addition to minor and drafting amendments, re-numbering and the updating of statutory and other references, these Regulations make the following changes of substance.

entry.title: The Council Tax Benefit (Permitted Totals) (Amendment) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order amends the Council Tax Benefit (Permitted Totals) Order 1996 (S.I. 1996/678). This Order limits the amount by which council tax benefit may be increased on the exercise of the discretion provided by regulation 51(5) and 54(4) of the Council Tax Benefit (General) Regulations 1992 (S.I. 1992/1814).

entry.title: The Electoral Commission (Limit on Public Awareness Expenditure) Order 2001
entry.summary: Under section 13(1) of the Political Parties, Elections and Referendums Act 2000, the Electoral Commission are required to promote public awareness of the matters specified in that provision (which include current electoral systems and systems of local government). This Order exercises the power in section 13(6) of that Act to set a limit on the total expenditure in any financial year in respect of such functions.

entry.title: The Ravensbourne Priority Health National Health Service Trust (Dissolution) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order dissolves on 1st April 2001 the Ravensbourne Priority Health National Health Service Trust.

entry.title: The Kingston and District Community National Health Service Trust (Dissolution) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order dissolves on 1st April 2001 the Kingston and District Community National Health Service Trust.

entry.title: The Barnet Community Healthcare, the Enfield Community Care and the Haringey Health Care National Health Service Trusts (Dissolution) Order 2001
entry.summary: This version of the The Barnet Community Healthcare, the Enfield Community Care and the Haringey Health Care National Health Service Trusts (Dissolution) Order 2001 is published under the authority and superintendence of the Queen's Printer of Acts of Parliament and Controller of HMSO. It has been prepared to reflect the text as it was Made.

entry.title: The Foot-and-Mouth Disease (Ascertainment of Value) (Scotland) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order, which extends to Scotland only, establishes the system for ascertaining the value of animals slaughtered because of foot-and-mouth disease.

entry.title: The Climate Change Levy (Solid Fuel) Regulations 2001

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Climate Change Levy (Solid Fuel) Regulations 2001

entry.summary: These Regulations provide that solid fuel with an open market value not exceeding £15 per tonne at the time it is supplied is not a taxable commodity for the purposes of climate change levy.

entry.title: The Community Health Services, Southern Derbyshire National Health Service Trust (Dissolution) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order dissolves The Community Health Services Southern Derbyshire National Health Service Trust on 1st April 2001. It should be read in conjunction with the Southern Derbyshire Mental Health National Health Service Trust Change of Name and (Establishment) Amendment Order 2001. The latter trust is to carry out certain functions previously carried out by the trust which is dissolved by this Order.

entry.title: The Teddington Memorial Hospital and Community National Health Service Trust (Dissolution) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order dissolves on 1st April 2001 the Teddington Memorial Hospital and Community National Health Service Trust.

entry.title: The Postal Services Act 2000 (Determination of Turnover for Penalties) Order 2001

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Postal Services Act 2000 (Determination of Turnover for Penalties) Order 2001

entry.summary: This Order specifies the way to determine the turnover of a licence holder for the purposes of section 30(2) of the Postal Services Act 2000. Where the Postal Services Commission (“the Commission”) is satisfied that a licence holder has contravened or is contravening any condition of his licence, the Commission may impose on the licence holder a penalty of up to 10 per cent. of its turnover determined in accordance with the provisions specified in this Order.

entry.title: The Capital Gains Tax (Gilt-edged Securities) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order specifies gilt-edged securities disposals of which are exempt from tax on chargeable gains in accordance with section 115 of the Taxation of Chargeable Gains Act 1992 (c. 12) (“section 115”).

entry.title: The Camden and Islington Mental Health National Health Service Trust (Establishment) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order establishes the Camden and Islington Mental Health National Health Service Trust, an NHS trust provided for in section 5 of the National Health Service and Community Care Act 1990.

entry.title: The Climate Change Levy (Electricity and Gas) Regulations 2001

ukm:Supersedes.dc:title: The Climate Change Levy (Electricity and Gas) Regulations 2001

entry.summary: These Regulations make provision for the proper application of climate change levy (CCL) in sectors of the electricity and gas industries.

entry.title: The West Hampshire National Health Service Trust (Establishment) Order 2001
entry.summary: This Order establishes the West Hampshire National Health Service Trust, an NHS trust provided for in section 5 of the National Health Service and Community Care Act 1990.
